about_the_game:
A catastrophe has occurred in the world: the Earth's poles have started to change places, and this has caused chaos. People sensitive to the changes become aggressive and start attacking each other. Scientific minds have created the Hindex scale, which shows the level of activity of storms on a 12-point system. Your task is to survive in this dangerous world by exploring three mini-locations: forest, city and beach.

Fight a variety of unique enemies, each with special abilities.

Build bases using various structures: barricades (wooden and stone), turrets (regular and flamethrower), barbed and oil nets, electrical nets, mines and explosive barrels. Use electrical buildings: generators, solar panels and transformers to create powerful defenses.

Explore the forest, where there is a merchant's lair that updates the assortment daily. Purchase first aid kits, ammo and building materials using the “material” currency, which you can get by killing rabids.

Collect junk around the world to unlock new, improved build types. Explore, fight and survive in this ruthless world where every step you take could be your last!
detailed_description:
A catastrophe has occurred in the world: the Earth's poles have started to change places, and this has caused chaos. People sensitive to the changes become aggressive and start attacking each other. Scientific minds have created the Hindex scale, which shows the level of activity of storms on a 12-point system. Your task is to survive in this dangerous world by exploring three mini-locations: forest, city and beach.

Fight a variety of unique enemies, each with special abilities.

Build bases using various structures: barricades (wooden and stone), turrets (regular and flamethrower), barbed and oil nets, electrical nets, mines and explosive barrels. Use electrical buildings: generators, solar panels and transformers to create powerful defenses.

Explore the forest, where there is a merchant's lair that updates the assortment daily. Purchase first aid kits, ammo and building materials using the “material” currency, which you can get by killing rabids.

Collect junk around the world to unlock new, improved build types. Explore, fight and survive in this ruthless world where every step you take could be your last!
name: H Index

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
